name: Rolling cena 3D
description:
This game is in Very, Very, Very early beta. 

Current version: 0.2 

Plot! -

John Xina wakes up and looks in the mirror, suddently he notices that hes a ball 😰

He opens the door and goes out in the world which sucks him into a portal. 

He gets dropped on some plain road, what does he do? 

He conquers it by going through it like a mafia boss.

Features-

Ability to roll with WASD

Shift to run

Space to slowly drag yourself up.

Well aligned camera

Bmws lol

Social credit

and loads more.

Known bugs-

Currently none, let us know if you find some.

I'd love to get some feedback as I want this game to reach true standards :)
